title: Clients â€” Center client logo and reduce whitespace
description: Center the client logo within its container and reduce excess whitespace. Ensure consistent rendering across different logo aspect ratios.
acceptanceCriteria: Logo centered vertically and horizontally in container
Consistent rendering across wide, tall, and square logos

steps.details: Locate the client logo display on the client detail page. Identify the container element and its current sizing/alignment styles.
Apply flex items-center justify-center to the container. Set the image to object-contain with appropriate max-width and max-height constraints.
Reduce the container's padding and height to minimize empty space. Use a tighter container (e.g., h-20 w-20 or h-24 w-24) with the logo scaling within it.

technicalNotes: object-contain ensures logos maintain aspect ratio regardless of container size
